Desc.entry: An independent fellowship of Christians with various Church backgrounds, such as Methodist, United Reformed, Baptist, Anglican etc, with an informal attitude to Church life, centred on the Bible as the Word of God.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Sunday Service 10.30am-12.30pm, alternate Wed at 8pm (Bible study), alternate Wed at 8pm (prayer meeting), one Thurs in the month at 7.45pm (prayer meeting), alternate Fri at 7.30pm (youth meeting)
